summary: Marketplace/NGO web app with necessity items, delivery tracking, testimonials/reviews, product details, donation budgeting UI, purchase vs donate flow (including anonymity), dummy analytics data, and fixes for NGO requirements page 404 and payment details display.
known_issues: NGO section links for requirements/deliveries currently return 'Not Found' when clicked (routing/page missing).

existing_features.title: Rename/retitle marketplace language across the UI from generic 'Products' to 'Necessity Items' (including headings, buttons, empty states, and navigation labels) while keeping existing routes intact.
Fix NGO section navigation so clicking 'Post Requirements' and 'Delivery Tracking' does not show 'Not Found' by updating NGO navbar links to match existing routes in the router.
Add a 'Delivery' section for end users that shows delivery status and allows navigating to a detailed tracking view using an existing trackingId-based route.
Add a testimonials section to the public website with multiple dummy testimonials (name, role/type, short quote, and a rating) and render it in a prominent public location (e.g., Landing page).

Add seller authenticity star ratings and review summaries to marketplace listings and product detail views using dummy data, and ensure the ratings are consistently displayed wherever seller info is shown.
Ensure that opening a marketplace item shows a clear, readable description section on the product detail page (and handle missing descriptions gracefully with a sensible dummy fallback).
Add a donation budgeting UI for donors: allow the donor to set a budget, and based on that budget show recommended donation necessity items (UI only; no backend logic required).

Update the marketplace item checkout flow so that when a user initiates purchase from a product detail page, the UI offers: (1) Buy for yourself, or (2) Donate; if Donate is selected, prompt for 'Donate anonymously' vs 'Show my name'.

Show payment details during both buying and donating flows, including a clear cost breakdown (item price/donation amount, fees if any as dummy values, total), and payer/donor details (including anonymity selection when applicable).
Populate all relevant pages/sections with realistic dummy data (maps, charts, analytics, tables, and lists) so that dashboards and analytics views do not appear empty or placeholder-only.

Apply a cohesive visual theme refresh across newly added/modified sections (testimonials, ratings, delivery status, checkout/payment panels, donation budget UI) with consistent typography, spacing, and a warm, trustworthy palette (avoid blue/purple).

new_feature_requests.summary: Rename/convert products to 'necessity items' across the marketplace UI/content.
Add a Delivery section that shows delivery status/tracking.
Show item description when opening/viewing a product detail page.
Donation budgeting UI: donor sets a budget and UI shows recommended donation items (UI only).
Checkout flow: when buying a marketplace item, let user choose 'buy for yourself' vs 'donate'; if donate, ask anonymous vs show name.
Populate all sections with dummy data (maps, charts, analytics).
NGO section: post requirements and deliveries; fix 'Not Found' error when clicked (routing/page).
Show payment details during buying/donating flow (payment details UI).

projectName: Marketplace necessities terminology, delivery status section, testimonials, seller ratings, donation budget UI, and checkout donate/anonymity flow + NGO 404 fixes
